title: World-Wide
text:
---

New York state's Democrat-dominated Assembly said that it would begin an impeachment investigation into Gov. Cuomo.

---

The EU expanded its list of approved Covid-19 vaccines to four, but the addition of J&J's shot appears unlikely soon to accelerate Europe's lagging rollout.

---

China's legislature approved electoral changes that would put pro-Beijing loyalists firmly in charge of Hong Kong and squeeze opposition groups from elected office.

---

The House passed a pair of gun-control bills that were blocked in the last Congress, advancing a priority of Democratic leaders.

---

Israel has targeted at least a dozen Syria-bound vessels mostly carrying Iranian oil out of concern that petroleum profits are funding extremism in the Mideast, U.S. and regional officials say.

---

A judge reinstated a charge of third-degree murder against the former police officer accused of killing George Floyd.
